TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IOutputSessionChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel`1<class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession>, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject

Docs.summary: Defines the interface that associates an output channel with a session.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSessionChannel> interface indicates that an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel> implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession> semantics.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession> associated with an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSessionChannel> can be retrieved through the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601.Session%2A> property.
